languages.text: "Уверен, арбитры уничтожают ксеносов на других шпилях. А я внесу свою лепту здесь — мы не допустим, чтобы Даргонус пал".
languages.translation_comment:
During the Drukhari assault on Dargonus.
Abelard: "I cannot believe it... In the entire history of the von Valancius protectorate, there has never been an attack on the capital world."

traits.locale_text: "Уверен, арбитры уничтожают ксеносов на других шпилях. А я внесу свою лепту здесь — мы не допустим, чтобы Даргонус пал".

languages.text: "I am sure the Arbitrators already have their hands full exterminating xenos on the other spires. Then, I will do my part here — we won't let Dargonus fall."
languages.translation_comment:
During the Drukhari assault on Dargonus.
Abelard: "I cannot believe it... In the entire history of the von Valancius protectorate, there has never been an attack on the capital world."
languages.original_text: "Уверен, арбитры уничтожают ксеносов на других шпилях. А я внесу свою лепту здесь — мы не допустим, чтобы Даргонус пал".

traits.locale_text: "I am sure the Arbitrators already have their hands full exterminating xenos on the other spires. Then, I will do my part here — we won't let Dargonus fall."
"I am sure the Arbitrators already have their hands full exterminating xenos on the other spires. Then, I will do my part here — we won't let Dargonus fall."
"I am sure the Arbitrators already have their hands full exterminating xenos on the other spires. Then, I will do my part here — we won't let Dargonus fall."
"I am sure the Arbitrators already have their hands full exterminating xenos on the other spires. Then, I will do my part here — we won't let Dargonus fall."
"I am sure the Arbitrators already have their hands full exterminating xenos on the other spires. Then, I will do my part here — we won't let Dargonus fall."
"I am sure the Arbitrators already have their hands full exterminating xenos on the other spires. Then, I will do my part here — we won't let Dargonus fall."

languages.text: 「アービトレイターたちは、すでに他の尖塔で異種族の掃討に手を焼いているはずだ。ならば、ここは俺が引き受けよう。ダルゴナスを決して陥落させはしない」
languages.original_text: "I am sure the Arbitrators already have their hands full exterminating xenos on the other spires. Then, I will do my part here — we won't let Dargonus fall."

traits.locale_text: 「アービトレイターたちは、すでに他の尖塔で異種族の掃討に手を焼いているはずだ。ならば、ここは俺が引き受けよう。ダルゴナスを決して陥落させはしない」

languages.text: "Die Arbitratoren haben gewiss alle Hände voll damit zu tun, auf den anderen Türmen Xenos auszulöschen. Dann leiste ich hier meinen Beitrag. Wir lassen nicht zu, dass Dargonus fällt."
languages.original_text: "I am sure the Arbitrators already have their hands full exterminating xenos on the other spires. Then, I will do my part here — we won't let Dargonus fall."

traits.locale_text: "Die Arbitratoren haben gewiss alle Hände voll damit zu tun, auf den anderen Türmen Xenos auszulöschen. Dann leiste ich hier meinen Beitrag. Wir lassen nicht zu, dass Dargonus fällt."

languages.text: « Je suis sûr que les arbitrators sont déjà bien occupés à exterminer les xénos des autres tours, et je remplirai mon rôle ici. Nous ne laisserons pas Dargonus tomber. »
languages.original_text: "I am sure the Arbitrators already have their hands full exterminating xenos on the other spires. Then, I will do my part here — we won't let Dargonus fall."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis sûr que les arbitrators sont déjà bien occupés à exterminer les xénos des autres tours, et je remplirai mon rôle ici. Nous ne laisserons pas Dargonus tomber. »

languages.text: «Seguro que los Arbitrator ya están atareados exterminando xenos en las otras torres. Yo también cumpliré mi parte aquí: no permitiremos que caiga Dargonus».
languages.original_text: "I am sure the Arbitrators already have their hands full exterminating xenos on the other spires. Then, I will do my part here — we won't let Dargonus fall."

traits.locale_text: «Seguro que los Arbitrator ya están atareados exterminando xenos en las otras torres. Yo también cumpliré mi parte aquí: no permitiremos que caiga Dargonus».

languages.text: “我相信，其他法务官已经在忙着消灭入侵尖塔的异形了。我也同样会尽我所能，我们绝不会让达戈努斯陷落。”
languages.original_text: "I am sure the Arbitrators already have their hands full exterminating xenos on the other spires. Then, I will do my part here — we won't let Dargonus fall."

traits.locale_text: “我相信，其他法务官已经在忙着消灭入侵尖塔的异形了。我也同样会尽我所能，我们绝不会让达戈努斯陷落。”

languages.text: "Eminim Yargıcılar, diğer kulelerde zenoların köklerini kurutmakla meşguldür. Ben de burada üzerime düşeni yapıp Dargonus'un düşmesine müsaade etmeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "I am sure the Arbitrators already have their hands full exterminating xenos on the other spires. Then, I will do my part here — we won't let Dargonus fall."

traits.locale_text: "Eminim Yargıcılar, diğer kulelerde zenoların köklerini kurutmakla meşguldürler. Ben de burada üzerime düşeni yapıp Dargonus'un düşmesine müsaade etmeyeceğim."

languages.original_text: "I am sure the Arbitrators already have their hands full exterminating xenos on the other spires. Then, I will do my part here — we won't let Dargonus fall."
